name.ja: <ruby>ＦＡ<rt>フルアーマード</rt></ruby>－ダーク・ナイト・ランサー

text.en:
3 Level 7 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Full Armored DARK Lancer" by using 1 Rank 5 or 6 Xyz Monster you control. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Gains 300 ATK for each material attached to it and each card equipped to it. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Xyz" card in your GY; add it to your hand. Once per turn, if an Equip Card(s) becomes equipped to a monster you control: You can attach 1 monster your opponent controls to this card as material.
